_header: He that harboreth a friar harboreth physic

BLHar2252.Transcription:
He that harborythe a ffrere harborythe fesykAnd he þat
                    harborythe a farte harborthe the colyckeBut whate he be þat wyll leve
                    in helthe & goode quarteLoke well þat he harborow neythyr frere
                    nor farte
BLHar2252.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “A Middle English Anti-Mendicant Squib.” 
             English Language Notes
         1 (1963-64): 163-4: 163.
